entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023
